items.headline: The Fed’s cutting while the economy’s growing: Buy more stocks, hold less cash, this bank says

items.headline: Homeowners pounce on falling mortgage rates, with more opting for risky, adjustable-rate loans
items.summary_en: As mortgage rates fell sharply ahead of the Federal Reserve’s expected — and highly anticipated — rate cut, mortgage demand surged as homeowners rushed to refinance their home loans.
